item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Wild Grass
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Wild Herbs using Barehanded Gathering.

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.

item.name: Apple
item.desc: A tasty apple used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Fruit Juice, Fruit Pudding, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Apple Trees using Bare Hands or purchased from a special Merchant.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Weeds
item.desc: It’s just a useless weed. You can sell it for a cheap price to merchants.
